message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $100. It's a great deal for you, considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $90 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm still not quite there.  I'm willing to come down to $95.  This is a fair price considering the product's value. Let's make this deal happen!
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate it. Based on my budget, I can consider purchasing the product for $90. I hope this aligns with your expectations.
